title: New Apple announcements didn’t happen this week but the new Macworld did
content:
Will there be no Apple event in March? And will a man lose his eyebrows over it? And we have some news to share about the Macworld website. It’s all in this episode of the Macworld Podcast. 

This is episode 734 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.

Listen to episode 734

Get info

Learn more about the topics we discussed on the show. 

  • Apple’s event calendar: The next event is in April, claims Prosser
  • Welcome to the new Macworld.com

siteTitle: Why the next iPad Pro will be closer than ever to a Mac
